dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Caspian Sea is just hemorrhaging dead seals again, isn't it? Seventy more just found near Akshukur and Sain Shapagatov.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Caspian Sea is just hemorrhaging dead seals again, isn't it? Seventy more just found near Akshukur and Sain Shapagatov.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seventy dead seals have been found washed ashore along the Caspian Sea coast near the villages of Akshukur and Sain Shapagatov in the Tupkaragan district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's just the ones they can actually get to. The post from the Mangystau ecology department says they're testing water samples, but we don't have results yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's just the ones they can actually get to. The post from the Mangystau ecology department says they're testing water samples, but we don't have results yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Environmental specialists from the Department of Ecology of the Mangystau region visited the site and collected seawater samples from the area. The test results are not yet available.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's like a recurring nightmare. Last year, over 130 were found in the same spots, right? And that was part of a much larger die-off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like a recurring nightmare. Last year, over one hundred thirty were found in the same spots, right? And that was part of a much larger die-off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is worth noting that last year, more than 130 carcasses of marine animals were discovered in the same areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Over 2,000 total carcasses along the coast last year, but they admit that's probably an undercount because of all the remote, hard-to-reach areas. It's so grim.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Over two thousand total carcasses along the coast last year, but they admit that's probably an undercount because of all the remote, hard-to-reach areas. It's so grim.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In total, over 2,000 seal carcasses were found along the coast. However, this number does not reflect the full picture, as no count is conducted in hard-to-reach areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the worst part is, they couldn't even figure out why last time because the bodies were too decomposed for proper sampling. So frustrating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the worst part is, they couldn't even figure out why last time because the bodies were too decomposed for proper sampling. So frustrating.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the time, experts were unable to determine the cause of death, as the bodies were in an advanced state of decomposition, making it impossible to collect samples.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the Fisheries Committee had that theory about natural gases from underwater earthquakes, but it was just a guess. They never confirmed it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the Fisheries Committee had that theory about natural gases from underwater earthquakes, but it was just a guess. They never confirmed it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Back then, the Fisheries Committee suggested that the cause of death could be natural phenomena, including the release of natural gases triggered by underwater earthquakes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And now here we are again. This is the second major incident this year—they found 88 back in April during a monitoring operation by the fisheries inspection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now here we are again. This is the second major incident this year-they found eighty eight back in April during a monitoring operation by the fisheries inspection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on April 29, 88 seal carcasses were discovered along the Caspian coast in the Tupkaragan district of the Mangystau region during a monitoring operation by the Zhaiyk-Caspian Interregional Basin Fisheries Inspection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It feels like we're just watching this happen on a loop without any real answers. What if it's not natural? What if it's pollution or something else entirely?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It feels like we're just watching this happen on a loop without any real answers. What if it's not natural? What if it's pollution or something else entirely?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The fact that it keeps happening in the Tupkaragan district specifically… that can't be a coincidence, can it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The fact that it keeps happening in the Tupkaragan district specifically... that can't be a coincidence, can it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Seventy dead seals have been found washed ashore along the Caspian Sea coast near the villages of Akshukur and Sain Shapagatov in the Tupkaragan district. Earlier, on April 29, 88 seal carcasses were discovered along the Caspian coast in the Tupkaragan district of the Mangystau region during a monitoring operation by the Zhaiyk-Caspian Interregional Basin Fisheries Inspection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You'd think with this many events, there'd be a more urgent push for a real, definitive investigation. I mean, these are endangered Caspian seals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You'd think with this many events, there'd be a more urgent push for a real, definitive investigation. I mean, these are endangered Caspian seals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's heartbreaking. And without those samples from last year, they're basically starting from zero every single time. They need a better response plan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's heartbreaking. And without those samples from last year, they're basically starting from zero every single time. They need a better response plan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Let's hope the water samples from this latest event actually give them something to work with. We can't just keep counting bodies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Let's hope the water samples from this latest event actually give them something to work with. We can't just keep counting bodies.
